data.eml:eml: A rare ant on Samoa: first record of the cryptic subfamily Proceratiinae (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) and description of a new Proceratium Roger species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Cong, Fischer, Georg, Economo, Evan P. (2015): A rare ant on Samoa: first record of the cryptic subfamily Proceratiinae (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) and description of a new Proceratium Roger species. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 46: 35-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.46.5849, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.46.5849
